CustomField.formula: IF(TEXT(Carrier__c) = "Blue", "London ", IF(TEXT(Carrier__c) = "Red", "Continental ", IF(TEXT(Carrier__c) = "Purple", "Both ", "") ) ) + IF( NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(Carrier__c))), IMAGE( "/resource/ticket/colors/tag_" + IF( TEXT(Carrier__c) = "Red", "red.png", IF( TEXT(Carrier__c) = "Blue", "blue.png", IF( TEXT(Carrier__c) = "Purple", "purple.png", "" ) ) ), "Ticket color image" ), "" )
CustomField.label: Carrier Flag
